<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Helper utility for adding DW&#95;OP&#95;LLVM&#95;tag&#95;offset to debug-info records,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// abstracted over whether they&#39;re intrinsic-stored or DbgVariableRecord</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// stored.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AnnotateDbgRecord = &#91;&amp;&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;DPtr) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Prepend &quot;tag&#95;offset, N&quot; to the dwarf expression.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Tag offset logically applies to the alloca pointer, and it makes sense</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to put it at the beginning of the expression.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;uint64&#95;t, 8&gt;</a> NewOps = &#123;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/dwarf/#a78e9cb1527edb3cc1d1ee577257b5f0ca989f426170b8ef321ffeb4838b4c590f">dwarf::DW&#95;OP&#95;LLVM&#95;tag&#95;offset</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac226f3d2b9ca090171a8e0a8cb92c343ac101058e7ea21bbbf2a5ac893088e90b">Tag</a>&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LocNo = 0; LocNo &lt; DPtr-&gt;getNumVariableLocationOps(); ++LocNo)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (DPtr-&gt;getVariableLocationOp(LocNo) == <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/cseinfo-cpp/#a75f8a8519c2c9b30e7c06dc5e256fffa">Info</a>.AI)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><span class="doxyHighlight">        DPtr-&gt;setExpression(</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;DAI = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/memtag/#a1a729b270e892027cebc9ef12939ec7a">DynCastToDbgAssign</a>(DPtr)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (DAI-&gt;getAddress() == <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/cseinfo-cpp/#a75f8a8519c2c9b30e7c06dc5e256fffa">Info</a>.AI)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0b2a153b655ed78a07468297eb4c6256">llvm::for&#95;each</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/cseinfo-cpp/#a75f8a8519c2c9b30e7c06dc5e256fffa">Info</a>.DbgVariableIntrinsics, AnnotateDbgRecord);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0b2a153b655ed78a07468297eb4c6256">llvm::for&#95;each</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/cseinfo-cpp/#a75f8a8519c2c9b30e7c06dc5e256fffa">Info</a>.DbgVariableRecords, AnnotateDbgRecord);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/memtag/#abc9e58a3e27b86d2eb05efba577c6000"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/memtag/#abc9e58a3e27b86d2eb05efba577c6000">incrementThreadLong</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder&lt;&gt;</a> &amp;IRB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;ThreadLong,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><span class="doxyHighlight">                           </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Inc) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Update the ring buffer. Top byte of ThreadLong defines the size of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// buffer in pages, it must be a power of two, and the start of the buffer</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// must be aligned by twice that much. Therefore wrap around of the ring</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// buffer is simply Addr &amp;= ~((ThreadLong &gt;&gt; 56) &lt;&lt; 12).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The use of AShr instead of LShr is due to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   https://bugs.llvm.org/show&#95;bug.cgi?id=39030</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Runtime library makes sure not to use the highest bit.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Mechanical proof of this address calculation can be found at:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// https://github.com/google/sanitizers/blob/master/hwaddress-sanitizer/prove&#95;hwasanwrap.smt2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Example of the wrap case for N = 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Pointer:   120095990063214600</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                     +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//            8</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                     =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//            120095990063214600</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                     &amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// WrapMask:  18446744073709548000</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                     =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//            120095990063210500</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Then the WrapMask will be a no-op until the next wrap case.</span></CodeLine>
